definition: variant of 杯[bei1]/trophy cup/classifier for certain containers of liquids: glass, cup
cup/trophy cup/classifier for certain containers of liquids: glass, cup

sentences.english: "Let's go for it again, " Bryant said, moments before hoisting the finals MVP trophy.
sentences.chinese: “我们再来一次吧”科比在接过MVP奖杯前狂喊。

sentences.english: Ma won a debate competition for Asian college students 22 years ago.
sentences.chinese: 早在22年前，他就赢得“亚洲大专辩论会”的奖杯。

sentences.english: We’ll need to be in the final if we want the trophy.
sentences.chinese: 要拿大耳朵奖杯的话，我们必须杀进决赛。

sentences.english: Our constant aim will be to compete for silverware and championships.
sentences.chinese: 我们永远的目标都是获取奖杯和冠军。

sentences.english: Berries scoop up disease-fighting honors like kids in sports collect trophies.
sentences.chinese: 浆果在抵抗疾病上的荣誉就像孩子收集的体育奖杯。

sentences.english: Willard was standing courtside, watching Dallas lift the title trophy.
sentences.chinese: 他在场边看着小牛队高高举起冠军奖杯。

sentences.english: June 12, Cuba's Luo Bosi kiss trophy celebration.
sentences.chinese: 6月12日，古巴选手罗伯斯亲吻奖杯庆祝。

sentences.english: Trophy cases include different shapes and sizes of fully pre-assembled glass display cases.
sentences.chinese: 奖杯案件有不同的形状和大小完全组装玻璃展柜。

sentences.english: I think when we start to win trophies, we can change.
sentences.chinese: 我认为当我们赢得奖杯的时候，一切都会被改变。

sentences.english: Gazing afterward at the large, silver trophy, Mr. Boylan felt emotional.
sentences.chinese: 事后，博伊兰望着银闪闪的大奖杯，百感交集。

sentences.english: Could the next trophy be from a beauty pageant?
sentences.chinese: 下一座奖杯可能来自一位选美大赛冠军吗？

sentences.english: You should see an alcove with the trophy.
sentences.chinese: 你应该能看到一个有一个奖杯的壁龛。

sentences.english: A wall with different trophies and certificates.
sentences.chinese: 一面有很多奖杯和证书的的墙。

sentences.english: In three years at Porto, they clinched two titles.
sentences.chinese: 在波尔图的三年间，他们两次亲吻到冠军奖杯。

sentences.english: Her words meant more to me than any competition award.
sentences.chinese: 对我来说，她的话远胜任何大赛的奖杯。

sentences.english: Today, I feel that I am in a team where I can win trophies.
sentences.chinese: 现在我觉得自己在一支能够赢得奖杯的球队。

definition: to win a championship/to come out top/to take the cup
to take (after a struggle)/to wrest/to seize/to capture/to win (a trophy)
laurel/victory garland (in Greek and Western culture)
